OrgName.entry: NORTON LEES LODGE RESIDENTIAL DEMENTIA CARE HOME

Desc.entry: A private residential care home with 40 beds that provides care for Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI) clients. Run by Orchard Care Homes. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
